settings.heading: #1: Prep the Skin
settings.description: Start by applying a small amount of Light Moisture Cream all over the face. Add more if needed. Use a touch of Eye Cream under the eyes to prep for The Face Pencil.

settings.heading: #2: Conceal and Correct
settings.description: Use The Face Pencil to cover redness and dark spots, correct discoloration, and lighten dark circles. Use Tinted Face Powder to further color correct where needed, and minimize shine.

settings.heading: #3: Add Warmth To The Skin
settings.description: Apply The Bronzer to places where the sun naturally touches the face—like the forehead, cheeks, and bridge of the nose—using the Bronzer Brush. Also works perfectly on the neck to seamlessly blend the face to the body.

settings.heading: #4: Subtle Shine
settings.description: When it comes to the lips, keep it monochromatic by applying a little bit of the same Peachy Nude shadow to lips using your finger. Add Miracle Balm in Au Naturel on top for hydration.

settings.heading: About the Look
settings.description: This is our take on a simple, matte look, focusing on flawless complexion and adding warmth to the skin.

Light Moisture Cream

Eye Cream

The Face Pencil

The Bronzer
